requirementText.name: File group identifier
requirementText.description: An xml:id identifier for the file group used for internal package references. It must be unique within the package.

testCase.description: The requirement links to 5.2.1. The use of identifiers and is mostly handled by XML schema validation. However, the ID attribute is optional according to METS.xsd, so this testcase has one rule to check if the ID attribute exists

rule.description: There MUST be an ID attribute on every fileGrp

error.message: There MUST be an ID attribute on every fileGrp
